seed_pair.target: He said that he wants to show you something.
seed_pair.known: Él dijo que quiere mostrarte algo.

seed_pair.target: She said that she doesn't want to live in a city.
seed_pair.known: Ella dijo que no quiere vivir en una ciudad.

seed_pair.target: I think that he wants to sit down.
I think that she doesn't want to work from home.
seed_pair.known: Creo que ella no quiere trabajar desde casa.

seed_pair.target: I know that young woman who's talking to your friend.
seed_pair.known: Conozco a esa mujer joven que está hablando con tu amigo.

seed_pair.target: I know that young man who's sitting over there.
seed_pair.known: Conozco a ese hombre joven que está sentado allí.

seed_pair.target: Yes she's a friend of my mother.
seed_pair.known: Sí ella es una amiga de mi madre.

seed_pair.target: No I've never seen her before.
seed_pair.known: No nunca la he visto antes.

seed_pair.target: She could write a story about that man.
seed_pair.known: Ella podría escribir una historia sobre ese hombre.
